articles.title: 'No easy fix to address obesity' - Pacific health leader - RNZ
articles.description: About 70 to 80 percent of adults are living with obesity in Tonga, American Samoa and Nauru.
articles.content:
Close up of fast food snacks and drink on table. Photo: 123rf.com
About 70 to 80 percent of adults are living with obesity in Tonga, American Samoa and Nauru.
